properties.name: User Management
properties.tagline: Get true user sessions and control account sharing, session duration and timeouts

sections.title: Enable Plugin Feature: User Management
summary: Purpose - User Management offers real user sessions, finer control over user session time-out, and ensures users have logged-in in a correct manner.
Recommendation - Keep the User Management feature turned on.

sections.title: User Session Management
summary: Purpose - Allows you to better control user sessions on your site and expire idle sessions and prevent account sharing.
Recommendation - Use of this feature is highly recommend.

sections.title: Multi-Factor User Authentication
summary: Purpose - Verifies the identity of users who log in to your site - i.e. they are who they say they are.
Recommendation - Use of this feature is highly recommend. However, if your host blocks email sending you may lock yourself out.

sections.title: By-Pass User Accounts Management
summary: Purpose - Compatibility with XML-RPC services such as the WordPress iPhone and Android Apps.
Recommendation - Keep this turned off unless you know you need it.

sections.title: Admin Login Notification
summary: Purpose - So you can be made aware of when a WordPress administrator has logged into your site when you are not expecting it.
Recommendation - Use of this feature is highly recommend.
